name: Eli Wallach
alma_mater: University of Texas at Austin  (B.A.)  City College of New York  (M.Ed.)   Eli Wallach, the character actor who had memorable roles in The Godfather: Part III, The Magnificent Seven, The Misfits, and Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps, passed away Tuesday at the age of 98. Neighborhood Playhouse School of the Theatre
notable_works: ''The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly'', ''The Magnificent Seven'', ''The Godfather Part III'', ''Batman (TV series)
awards: BAFTA Awards, Tony Awards, Emmy Awards, Honorary Academy Award
